LanguageData.VFEP_Warcaskets.label: броня мертвеца
LanguageData.VFEP_Warcaskets.description: Сборочная платформа позволяет создать броню мертвеца и заковать в неё персонажа.

VFEP_Warcaskets.generalRules.rulesString.li: subject_story->initiated the age of warcaskets, transforming foot soldiers into titans on the battlefield
subject_story->mastered the art of warcasket manufacturing, melding metal and might into a singular force
subject_story->ushered in a new era of warfare, where the line between man and machine blurred

LanguageData.VFEP_AdvancedWarcaskets.label: продвинутая броня мертвеца
LanguageData.VFEP_AdvancedWarcaskets.description: Продвинутые версии брони мертвеца, ориентированные на улучшение скорости, защиты или всего понемногу.

VFEP_AdvancedWarcaskets.generalRules.rul.li: subject_story->refined warcasket designs for speed, durability, and versatility, setting new standards in mechanized warfare
subject_story->crafted war machines that danced in battlefields with lethal grace
subject_story->balanced the trinity of speed, protection, and firepower in a symphony of destruction

LanguageData.VFEP_SpecialisedWarcaskets.label: специализированная броня мертвеца
LanguageData.VFEP_SpecialisedWarcaskets.description: Специализированная броня мертвеца позволяет решать сложные боевые задачи.

VFEP_SpecialisedWarcaskets.generalRules..li: subject_story->designed warcaskets with specialized roles, from silent assassins to unstoppable juggernauts
subject_story->broke the mold of traditional warfare, introducing units tailored for specific tactical needs
subject_story->elevated the warcasket program to new heights with bespoke war machines

LanguageData.VFEP_SpacerWarcaskets.label: космическая броня мертвеца
LanguageData.VFEP_SpacerWarcaskets.description: Броня мертвеца космического уровня является вершиной военных технологий.

VFEP_SpacerWarcaskets.generalRules.rules.li: subject_story->crafted warcaskets that harnessed spacer-era technology, embodying the zenith of military engineering
subject_story->merged the cutting edge of space-age tech with the ancient art of war, creating unparalleled battle machines
subject_story->redefined the battlefield with warcaskets that were legends incarnate
subject_gerund->achieving the apex of combat evolution

LanguageData.VFEP_WarcasketRemoval.label: удаление брони
LanguageData.VFEP_WarcasketRemoval.description: Операция «удалить броню мертвеца» позволяет отделить персонажа от брони. В процессе операции он потеряет обе ноги и руки, а броня мертвеца превратиться в мусор.

VFEP_WarcasketRemoval.generalRules.rules.li: subject_story->developed techniques to reclaim warriors from their metal confines, a bittersweet victory over the machine
subject_story->faced the grim reality of extracting the human core from the war machine, sacrificing limb for life
subject_story->turned the promise of mechanized might into the pain of loss, with every warcasket removal a reminder of war's toll
subject_gerund->unraveling the bond between flesh and steel

LanguageData.VFEP_WarcasketWeaponry.label: оружие мертвеца
LanguageData.VFEP_WarcasketWeaponry.description: Увеличенное в размерах оружие для установки на броню мертвеца.

VFEP_WarcasketWeaponry.generalRules.rule.li: subject_story->engineered devastating weaponry for warcaskets, turning them into walking arsenals
subject_story->bridged the gap between artillery power and infantry flexibility
subject_story->granted warcaskets the firepower to decimate, defend, and dominate

LanguageData.VFEP_SpacerWarcasketWeaponry.label: космическое оружие мертвеца
LanguageData.VFEP_SpacerWarcasketWeaponry.description: Новые технологии космического уровня позволят создавать огромные орудия для установки на броню мертвеца.

VFEP_SpacerWarcasketWeaponry.generalRule.li: subject_story->harnessed the mysteries of spacer tech to craft weapons of unrivaled potency for warcaskets
subject_story->ushered in an era where warcaskets wielded the power to alter the course of wars with a single shot
subject_story->married the art of war to the science of the stars, creating armaments born of the cosmos

LanguageData.VFEP_SweatFermentation.label: брожение пота
LanguageData.VFEP_SweatFermentation.description: Пошив одежды с уникальной способностью объединять дистилляцию спирта и синтез питательной пасты для производства рома из переработанных отходов человеческого тела.

VFEP_SweatFermentation.generalRules.rule.li: subject_story->turned the cycle of waste into a source of sustenance and spirit, crafting rum from the sweat of toil
subject_story->blurred the lines between distillation and desperation, finding innovation in the unconventional
subject_story->created a self-sustaining cycle of work, waste, and whiskey, fueling both body and morale
